title: What are the best smartphones for note-taking? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think that all smartphones are good for note-taking nowadays, and there is actually no best smartphone for it, just use mobile with a bigger display, so that it’s convenient to take notes. I use Redmi Note 5, and it’s great for note taking with the app Nimbus Note, which I also utilize on laptop, as this app is cross-platform and has synchronization(which is available even in free version).
Definitely the Samsung Galaxy Note 5. In fact, any of the Samsung Galaxy Note series, as they all come equipped with a stylus and several ways to create and save notes.
